Riekan flatly ignores Prometheus for the moment, more interested in 
the Tr=
ipredacus warrior in front of him.  Loading up another 
explosive harpoon, =
he looses it and his boomerang shark-fin blades at 
Tyreal.  "Our orders st=
and." he says simply.

Noir transforms to jet mode and strafes the Major, l=
etting her 
missiles do the talking.  Jayde follows suit, shifting into her=
 own 
rocket skiff form and raking at Tyreal with her ionic blaster.

Fury =
charges, lashknife whirling on its cable and cybervenom gun 
blazing away.
